content.question: If <math> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><msup> <mi>y</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> </math>, then at the point (1,1), <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> is

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
